com.koverse.sdk

Interface MapReduceContext

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MapReduceSourceContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSink.SinkMapReduceContext, MapReduceSourceContextTestImpl

    public interface MapReduceContext
    Provides context for MapReduce based imports, transforms, and exports.
    See Also:
    MapReduceSourceContext, AbstractSink, ExportFileFormat
